io.github.jonestimd.subset

Class SubsetSum<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.jonestimd.subset.SubsetSum<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the collection item type

    public class SubsetSum<V>
extends java.lang.Object
    For a collection, finds subsets having a specified sum. The collection can contain numbers or a function can be supplied to extract numbers from the collection items.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<java.math.BigDecimal> subset(java.math.BigDecimal sum, java.util.Collection<java.math.BigDecimal> items)
      For a collection of BigDecimal, find a subset having the specified sum.
      static <T extends java.lang.Number>
      java.util.List<T>      		 subset(java.util.Collection<T> items, T sum)
      For a collection of whole numbers, find a subset having the specified sum (uses Number.longValue()).

      For a collection, find the subsets having the specified sum.

      For a collection, find the subsets having the specified sum.
      static <T extends java.lang.Number>
      java.util.List<java.util.List<T>>      		 subsets(java.util.Collection<T> items, T sum, int maxResults)
      For a collection of numbers, find the subsets having the specified sum.

    • Method Detail

      • subsets

        public static <T> java.util.List<java.util.List<T>> subsets(java.math.BigDecimal sum,
                                                            java.math.BigDecimal itemTolerance,
                                                            java.util.Collection<T> items,
                                                            java.util.function.Function<? super T,java.math.BigDecimal> adapter,
                                                            int maxResults)
        For a collection, find the subsets having the specified sum.
        Parameters:
        sum - the target sum for the subsets
        itemTolerance - precision of the items in the collection
        items - the collection to search
        adapter - a function to extract the value to sum from the collection items
        maxResults - the maximum number of subsets to return (negative for no limit)
        Returns:
        the matching subsets
